aws_workspaces_directory.description: Provides a directory registration in AWS WorkSpaces Service.

directory_id.description: The directory identifier for registration in WorkSpaces service.

subnet_ids.description: The identifiers of the subnets where the directory resides.

tags.description: A map of tags assigned to the WorkSpaces directory.

self_service_permissions.description: The permissions to enable or disable self-service capabilities.

change_compute_type.description: Whether WorkSpaces directory users can change the compute type (bundle

increase_volume_size.description: Whether WorkSpaces directory users can increase the volume size of the drives on their workspace. Default `false`.

rebuild_workspace.description: Whether WorkSpaces directory users can rebuild the operating system of a workspace to its original state. Default `false`.

restart_workspace.description: Whether WorkSpaces directory users can restart their workspace. Default `true`.

switch_running_mode.description: Whether WorkSpaces directory users can switch the running mode of their workspace. Default `false`.
